name: SAMUDRA (Demo)
description:
------------------------------------

    

SAMUDRA follows the story of a boy who fell into the deepest sea and pushes forth to find a way back towards the surface world.

Discover an ocean filled with quirky deep-sea dwellers, opportunistic exploiters, ethereal locations, a dose of social satire & tons tons tons of pollutions. 

Experience an interactive & puzzle filled game-play revolving the elements of Light & Darkness, Sea Pollution, Nature VS Corporate, there are easter eggs to be hunted and secrets to be uncovered. 

SAMUDRA is an atmospheric visual experience with no dialogues/ text, with simple control and icons serving as the only guiding hands throughout this dreamlike trip. This game can be experienced by anyone regardless of their age & spoken language.

------------------------------------

Sa.mu.dra

(Devanagari: समुद्र) is a Sanskrit term 

literally meaning the "gathering together of waters" 

(saṃ- "together" and -udra "water"). 

It refers to an ocean, sea or confluence.

------------------------------------

SAMUDRA will be released in 2020 and we’ll be updating our progress regularly till then. All support/ feedbacks/ donation/ collaborations are absolutely welcomed & will be most appreciated! Feel free to leave a comment on your experience of the demo so far! 

This project was created first & foremost as an atmospheric story driven game, it was also heavily influenced by our experience as an activist in the Indonesian circle of NGO against Ocean Pollution, we hope to spread a deafening awareness to the consequence of human neglect towards nature. 

THANK YOU :)
